text: Rapunzel is a book by Paul O. Zelinsky retelling the Grimm brothers' "Rapunzel" story. Released by Dutton Press, it was the recipient of the Caldecott Medal for illustration in 1998.American Library Association: Caldecott Medal Winners, 1938 - Present. URL accessed 27 May 2009. The story is a retelling of the original 1812 version, which leaves in details not present in later versions, such as Rapunzel giving birth to twins by the prince. ==References== Category:1997 children's books Category:American picture books Category:Caldecott Medal-winning works Category:Books illustrated by Paul O. Zelinsky Category:Picture books based on fairy tales Category:Dutton Children's Books books Category:Works based on Rapunzel
title: Rapunzel (book)
